name: 陳文輝
objective: 本課程以講課配合系統實作方式，學習以物件導向程式開發應用系統。
schedule:
1. Java Collection
2. Graphs and Applications
3. Multithreading and Parallel Programming
4. Networking
5. Database Programming
6. MVC and Swing Models
7. Servlets
8. Web Services
scorePolicy:
出席率及作業40%
期中測驗30%
期末專案30%
materials:
Lecture Notes
Introduction to Java Programming, Comprehensive Version 9/E, Y. Daniel Liang
